member.name: DirectX.D3D10CalcSubresource
member.summary: Calculate a subresource index for a texture.
member.param: A zero-based index into an array of subtextures; 0 indicates the first, most detailed subtexture (or mipmap level).
The zero-based index of the first texture to use (in an array of textures).
Number of mipmap levels (or subtextures) to use.
member.returns: The index which equals MipSlice + (ArraySlice * MipLevels).
